name: Offroad Tunnel Construction
description:
Get ready to play offroad tunnel construction 3D to take a ride on drill machine and construct highway mountain. In this game you will provide by different construction machines, use them and construct carefully. This simulator game has many interesting and challenging missions to construct a tunnel. You should use heavy drilling machines for digging in the mountains for construction. You will use modern machinery to build tunnel. Enjoy mountain site simulator and drive heavy machines and park them carefully in the parking place to win the game. You can get the experience of construction machines driving and parking.

Your main object is to accept rocks drilling challenges and use your modern construction machine to build tunnel roads. Crazy build simulator has multiple levels in these real bridge construction site games. In this digging game, you should be careful while driving the machines to complete the levels. Tunnel build simulation game is real physics-based construction site game to construct tunnel simulator 3D. You will drive real heavy-duty vehicles just like an excavator, bulldozer and real digging machines to build a mountain.

This highway tunnel build simulator 2018 provides you essential machines to construct a beautiful tunnel simulation. If you can handle and drive all kinds of construction machines then this construction simulator is best for you. In this tunnel digging simulator game, you will drive heavy-duty machines simulation as like drilling machine, excavator and dump truck.
 
How to play:

• Select and play level.
• Tap accelerate to start the machine.
• Tap break to stop the machines.
• Use steering to move left/right.

 
Features:

• This game has different challenging missions.
• Realistic and beautiful environment.
• Stunning 3D graphics.
• Easy and unique game control.
• Realistic sound effects.
• Different heavy vehicles to drive.

If you like this offroad tunnel construction game, please try our other games by clicking “More from Developer” or by visiting our publisher account. And don’t forget to rate and review.
